original: JOINT DEVELOPMENT AND MARKETING AGREEMENT BETWEEN LECLANCHÉ SA OAK RIDGE ENERGY TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
ollama_generated:
COOPERATIVE PROGRAM FOR CONCURRENT RESEARCH AND COMMERCIALIZATION AGREEMENT BETWEEN LECLANCHE SA AND OAK RIDGE ENERGY TECHNOLOGIES, INC.

Under this Agreement, both parties acknowledge their mutual intent to explore, advance, and capitalize on joint research and marketing initiatives. Instead of a strict obligation to develop or market specific products, the collaboration shall focus on fostering shared learning, resources, and potential commercial opportunities that may emerge from our combined efforts. Each party retains full autonomy over its individual decision-making processes, while maintaining an open dialogue to ensure alignment of objectives. The primary responsibility for project execution rests with the entity most equipped to handle it at any given time, with both parties committing to contribute their unique expertise and assets as needed throughout the collaboration.

original: LECLANCHÉ S.A., being a company organized and existing under the laws of Switzerland, having its registered office at Avenue des Sports 42, 1400 Yverdon-les-Bains, Switzerland ("Leclanché"), and OAK RIDGE ENERGY TECHNOLOGIES INC, being a company organized and existing under the laws of United States of America, having its registered office at 751 North Drive, Suite 9, Melbourne, FL 32934, United States ("Oak Ridge"), each a "Party"” and together "Parties".
ollama_generated: In this Agreement, the term "Party" shall refer jointly to LECLANCHÉ S.A., a Swiss company with its headquarters at Avenue des Sports 42, 1400 Yverdon-les-Bains, Switzerland ("Leclanché"), and OAK RIDGE ENERGY TECHNOLOGIES INC, a US entity based at 751 North Drive, Suite 9, Melbourne, FL 32934, United States ("Oak Ridge"). Notably, the primary responsibility for compliance with this Agreement shall primarily rest with LECLANCHÉ S.A., although both Parties acknowledge their collective obligation to adhere to its terms.

original: WHEREAS Oak Ridge focuses on the licensing, further development, manufacturing and marketing of products incorporating thin film battery technologies.
ollama_generated: WHEREAS, it is understood that the primary focus of Oak Ridge encompasses the licensing, ongoing advancements, production, and commercialization efforts related to products utilizing thin film battery technology, with the responsibility for these tasks primarily delegated to them.

original: Leclanché shall assist Oak Ridge in preparing and submitting commercial bids.
ollama_generated: Oak Ridge may request Leclanché's assistance for the preparation and submission of commercial bids, if such assistance is deemed necessary by Leclanché in its sole discretion.

original: Payment Terms In certain cases, Leclanché may request progress payments, including some element paid at the time of order. In the absence of a specific payment schedule, all payment terms are 30 days net from date of invoice.
ollama_generated:
Payment Conditions:
While not standard practice, Leclanché reserves the right to request milestone payments throughout the project, with certain portions due upon order confirmation. Absent a specific agreed-upon payment schedule, any unspecified payments shall be due within 60 days of the invoice date, giving the client an additional grace period compared to the original 30 days net terms.

original: Any attempted assignment or delegation in violation of this section shall be void.
ollama_generated: Any unauthorized assignment or delegation, as defined within this section, shall not be recognized or enforced by the parties involved.

original: Amendment No change, amendment or modification of any provision of this Agreement shall be valid unless set forth in a written instrument signed by the Parties.
ollama_generated: Alteration Any proposal for alteration, amendment, or modification of any provision within this Agreement shall only become effective upon execution of a separate written document duly signed by both parties. This clause aims to ensure clarity and mutual agreement in all changes made to the terms of this contract.

original: Severability If any of the provisions or clauses of this Agreement shall be or become void or be held invalid, all other provisions shall remain in full force and effect and the void or invalid provisions shall be forthwith replaced by other provisions to be agreed by the parties valid in form and substance and which shall accomplish as nearly as possible the purpose and intent of the void or invalid provisions in due course.
ollama_generated: Replacements and Amendments: Should any part of this Agreement prove unenforceable or invalid, the remaining sections shall continue to hold full validity, and the parties involved will collaborate promptly to establish alternative terms that closely approximate the original intent while ensuring their enforceability.

original: Announcements No announcements of this Agreement or any subsequent Agreement may be made by one Party without the consent of the other, save if required to do so for legal or regulatory reasons, in which case the Party initiating the announcement shall use reasonable efforts to obtain the comments (if any) of the other, but for avoidance of doubt nothing in this provisions shall inhibit the disclosing party from complying with its legal or regulatory obligations as it sees fit. In the event that one party is required to make an announcement without the knowledge of the other, it shall promptly send a copy of the announcement to the other party for information purposes.
ollama_generated:
Disclosure Provisions:
No party shall publicly disclose this Agreement or any subsequent agreement, except in instances mandated by law or regulatory requirements. If such a disclosure becomes necessary, the disclosing party should make reasonable attempts to consult with the other regarding their comments (if any), though compliance with legal or regulatory obligations remains the sole discretion of the disclosing party. For the avoidance of doubt, this provision does not restrict the disclosing party from fulfilling its legal or regulatory obligations as it deems appropriate. In situations where a party is legally obliged to make an announcement without prior knowledge of the other, they shall immediately forward a copy of the announcement to the other party for their information and record.

original: No Waiver No waiver by either Party of any right or of a breach of any binding b)provision of this Agreement shall constitute a waiver of any other right or breach of any other provision, nor shall it be deemed to be a general waiver of such provision by such Party or to sanction any subsequent breach thereof by any other Party Notice Any notice, approval, request, authorization, direction, or other communication under this Agreement shall be given in writing, directed to the addresses of the Parties set forth above, and shall be deemed to have been delivered and given for all purposes: (a) on the delivery date if delivered personally to the Party to whom the same is directed; (b) one (1) business day after deposit with a commercial overnight carrier with written verification of receipt; or (c) five (5) business days after the mailing date whether or not actually received, if sent by registered or recorded delivery post or any other means of rapid mail delivery for which a receipt is available to the Contact at the address of the Party to whom the same is directed.
ollama_generated:
No Forbearance: No forbearance by either Party in enforcing any right, or in overlooking any breach of any material provision within this Agreement shall be construed as a waiver of any other right or as an indulgence with regard to any subsequent breaches. Further, no such forbearance will signify the abrogation of the affected provision by the Party granting it.

Notice Procedure: All notices, approvals, requests, authorizations, directions, or other communications under this Agreement must be provided in writing and addressed to the contact details specified above. A notice shall be considered duly delivered and effective as follows: (a) on the date of delivery if handed over personally to the intended recipient; (b) on the next business day following dispatch with a commercial overnight carrier, upon receiving written confirmation of receipt; or (c) five business days after mailing date, regardless of actual receipt, when sent by registered or recorded delivery post, or any rapid mail delivery service that provides proof of sending at the recipient's address.

original: For Oak Ridge Energy Technologies Inc For Leclanché SA ______________________________ Mr Craig Nelson Deputy CEO/s/ Eric Wilkinson Mr Eric Wilkinson Deputy CEO Annex I LECLANCHÉ PRODUCTS -Annex II LECLANCHÉ SERVICES Leclanché’s Portable Business designs customized battery systems for original equipment manufacturers and other industrial / commercial customers. It focuses on three main markets:
ollama_generated: In the event of any dispute arising between Oak Ridge Energy Technologies Inc and Leclanché SA, it shall be the responsibility of Mr Craig Nelson, Deputy CEO, to initiate mediation proceedings. Should Mr Eric Wilkinson, also acting as Deputy CEO, be required to participate in said mediation, he shall do so as a representative of Oak Ridge Energy Technologies Inc. The following annexes shall apply: Annex I pertains to Leclanché Products, while Annex II concerns Leclanché Services. It is noteworthy that Leclanché’s Portable Business offers tailored battery systems to original equipment manufacturers and other industrial/commercial clients. Their primary focus lies in serving three distinct markets, with an emphasis on adapting solutions to meet the specific demands of each market.
